actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch with amendments. With written report No. 99-298.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 649.

official_title: A bill to extend the Family Life Demonstration Program for three years.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Labor and Human Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 99-298) Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations through FY 1988 for adolescent family life demonstration projects.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Family Life Demonstration Program for three years.
